fields.label: Project Info
fields.placeholder: EBW-CI (East Brampton Watermain - Contract 1) | Project No. 14-1240, 14-1256, and 14-1257

fields.label: Overview Paragraph 1
fields.placeholder: This Project Register document has been prepared for C&M McNally for the East Brampton Watermain - Contract I (Region of Peel Project No. 14-1240, 14-1256, and 14-1257). Henceforth, this project is referred to as EBW-CI in this document.

fields.label: Overview Paragraph 2
fields.placeholder: This document includes submissions pertaining to project schedule in accordance with Schedule Specifications, Special Provisions and Instruction to Bidders (Document 2023-104T, Division 01, Section 01310 - Project Planning, Scheduling and Progress Reporting). This document comprises schedule print layouts for the baseline schedule (data date 2024-09-16), narrative for baseline schedule, as well as reference data for project controls.

fields.label: Overview Paragraph 3
fields.placeholder: A select list of project stakeholders is provided in the following table. Please see a Detailed List of Project Stakeholders in Section 6 - Project Scope.

fields.label: Stakeholder 4 - Project Number
fields.helpText: Project number at organization (leave empty if none)

fields.label: Stakeholder 5 - Project Number
fields.helpText: Project number at organization (leave empty if none)

fields.label: Stakeholder 6 - Role
fields.placeholder: Vendor's Consultant for Scheduling & Project Controls

fields.label: Contract Summary - Bullet 1
fields.placeholder: The East Brampton Watermain Contract I (EBW-CI) will include the installation of approximately 2.80 km of twinned 1050mm / 900mm and 1500mm watermains (WM) along Dixie Road, between Clark Blvd and North Park Drive in the City of Brampton (from Site 6 to Site 12).

fields.label: Contract Summary - Bullet 2
fields.placeholder: The proposed twin watermains will be constructed using trenchless methods. The tunnel between Shaft 6 and Shaft 9 is proposed to be a single large diameter tunnel with two watermain pipes installed inside. The single large tunnel will be constructed at a depth between approximately 24 to 29 meters below grade, and will entirely be in the rock.

fields.label: Contract Summary - Bullet 3
fields.placeholder: North of Shaft 9, two tunnels will be constructed at an average depth of seven (07) to thirteen (13) meters below grade which will be within overburden. A 134m long tunnel with 1500mm WM will connect the works on Dixie Road to the East Brampton Pump Station (from Shaft 10 to Shaft 11).

fields.label: Contract Summary - Bullet 4
fields.placeholder: The 900mm WM will extend for approximately 160m north of Shaft 10 via open cut towards North Park Drive. A connection from the 1050mm WM will extend west from Dixie Road for connection at Shaft 9c along Williams Parkway for approximately 125m via a single tunnel.
